channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Administration Cuts Off Funding for Fetal Tissue Research. Again.

item.title: Heart disease deaths declined. And here's how to reduce your risk of the #1 killer

item.title: Trump signs Board of Peace charter at Davos as allies split on Gaza plan
item.description: The signing ceremony marked the most concrete step yet in Trump's effort to establish the board, whose final composition has yet to be confirmed.

item.title: How a Major Winter Storm This Weekend Could Affect Your Travel Plans
item.description: Ice, sleet and possibly significant snowfall are threatening to snarl travel in much of the eastern U.S. starting on Friday. Here’s what to know.

item.title: Trump sues JPMorgan Chase and CEO Jamie Dimon for $5B over alleged 'debanking'
item.description: The lawsuit escalates a series of confrontations between the president and the leader of the country's biggest bank.

item.title: 3 people involved in Minnesota church protest arrested; judge rejects charges against journalist

item.title: Zelensky Laces Into Europe, Saying It Must Step Up or Be Left Behind
item.description: The Ukrainian leader’s speech in Davos, Switzerland, was one of his most scathing critiques of his closest allies.

item.title: An Emboldened Trump’s Whipsaw Approach to the World
item.description: He says there’s a method to the madness. But European allies wonder whether the United States is reliable anymore.

item.title: Barron Trump Called U.K. Police After Witnessing Woman ‘Getting Beat Up’ on Video Call
item.description: The details of an emergency call made by President Trump’s youngest son to the London police last year emerged during a trial this week.
